title: The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", but it changes with settings.
description: When the hyperlink builder is opened and then closed by clicking 'OK', upon reopening the hyperlink builder, the title changes to "www.actuate.com" instead of remaining as "Hyperlink Options".
OB:
1. Open the hyperlink builder.
2. Close the hyperlink builder by clicking 'OK'.
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder.
EB: Upon reopening the hyperlink builder, the title should remain as "Hyperlink Options".
SR:
1. Open the hyperlink builder.
2. Close the hyperlink builder by clicking 'OK'.
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder and observe the title.
